column4: Orix agrees to buy $290 mln of RBS shipping loans -sources

column5: CHICAGO  Jan 20 U.S. department store chains  hit by slowing sales for more than two years  have used layoffs  store closings and cutbacks to maintain one aspect of stability: profit margins.

column5: Wells Fargo & Co   the third-largest U.S. bank by assets  said on Thursday it would merge its international business with its wholesale banking unit that serves corporate clients.

column4: Western Union admits to aiding wire fraud  to pay $586 million
column5: WASHINGTON Western Union Co   the world's biggest money-transfer company  agreed to pay $586 million and admitted to turning a blind eye as criminals used its service for money laundering and fraud  U.S. authorities said on Thursday.
